General.Name: Cj Seafood
General.Description: CJ Seafood Corporation produces and processes seafood products in South Korea. It offers fish cake, meat, seaweed, and refrigerated/frozen food products. The company sells its products under the Samho Fish Cake and Samho Masal brand names. CJ Seafood Corporation also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Samho F&G, Inc. and changed its name to CJ Seafood Corporation in 2010. CJ Seafood Corporation was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Seongnam-si, South Korea.
